name: plugin-container
description: Plugin-container is a design pattern similar to Observer, but with ore embphasis on data prosessing, states, and cancelable actions

scripts.build-es3: tsc --project tsconfig_es3.json; tsc --project tsconfig_es3-spec.json; cp spec/assets/*.html build/es3; cat spec/assets/amd-exports-to-window-globals.js > build/es3/plugin-container-globals.js; cat build/es3/plugin-container-amd.js >> build/es3/plugin-container-globals.js
scripts.coverage-html-report: rm -rf coverage; nyc --clean -r lcov -e .ts -x "*Spec.ts" ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine --config=./spec/support/jasmine.json

author: Sebastian Gurin
